text: Latin Pop Albums is a record chart that is published weekly on Billboard magazine. The chart ranks Latin pop albums by the number of recorded sales an album made that week. == Chart achievements == Shakira's album Fijación Oral Vol. 1 became the best-selling album of the 2000s decade.
